product_name: The North Face RDT 300 Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Super warm and super soft, The North Face RDT 300 Fleece Jacket for men is a heavyweight, rapid-drying fleece jacket designed to be worn alone or layered on active adventures in colder conditions. Thick 300-weight fleece has FlashDry(TM) technology that wicks moisture away from the skin and transfers it to the outside for rapid evaporation. The North Face RDT 300 Fleece Jacket has zippered hand pockets and a hem cinch-cord. Zip-in integration feature lets you zip jacket into compatible shells and parkas from The North Face (not included). Closeout.
short_description: Super warm and super soft, The North Face RDT 300 Fleece Jacket for men is a heavyweight, rapid-drying fleece jacket designed to be worn alone or layered on active adventures in colder conditions.
